---

_The Silent Hag_ represents insight, treacherous secrets, and strife. As long as you have _The Silent Hag_ invested, it grants you a +2 item bonus to [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10), [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11), or [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) checks to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26)—when you invest the card, choose which of these four skills gains the bonus. You can change the skill by investing the card again. This increases to a +3 item bonus if you are at least 17th level.
